title: Gundry MD Bio Complete 3 Review
subtitle: Triple-biotic gut support with pre-, pro-, and postbiotics
author: FitnessSupps Editorial
disclaimers: Contains affiliate links — we may earn a commission.
keyClaims: 2B CFU per serving of mixed strains
Low-dose prebiotic blend compared with common studied intakes

ingredients.name: Sunfiber® (PHGG) + Acacia Gum
ingredients.claimedBenefit: Prebiotic fibre for regularity and satiety
ingredients.summary: PHGG and acacia are supported by human data for stool form and GI comfort, but common studied doses are several grams per day — higher than this label blend.

ingredients.name: Bacillus coagulans (ProDURA®) + Bifidobacterium bifidum (UABb-10)
ingredients.summary: 2B CFU per 2-capsule serving confirmed to reviewers; strain-level benefits vary, evidence for general digestive symptoms is reasonable, weight control claims are weaker.

ingredients.name: Tributyrin (CoreBiome®)
ingredients.claimedBenefit: Postbiotic butyrate source for gut barrier and motility
ingredients.summary: Butyrate physiology is well supported; human data on oral tributyrin is growing but still limited; dose appears within safe, studied ranges.

pros: Covers pre-, pro- and postbiotic in one capsule pair
cons: Prebiotic blend is only 450 mg — far below common 3–10 g study ranges
CFU count not shown on label — transparency downside
avoidIf: Severe IBS flare — introduce fibre cautiously
On specialist advice that restricts probiotics
dosage: 2 capsules once daily, preferably before a meal
timing: Take before a main meal. If sensitive, start with 1 capsule for 3–7 days.
sideEffects: Temporary gas, bloating, loose stools during adjustment

alternatives.name: Core Nutritionals Core GUT
alternatives.summary: Higher Sunfiber® dose with GI focus

alternatives.name: Sandhu’s GUT Health
alternatives.summary: Comparable triple-biotic format at lower price per serving

faq.q: How long until I notice changes?
faq.a: GI comfort changes often appear within 1–2 weeks. Full fibre benefits can take 3–4 weeks.

faq.q: Can I take it with coffee or food?
faq.a: Brand suggests before a meal. If sensitive, take with a small snack.

faq.q: Do I still need a separate fibre supplement?
faq.a: If you aim for study-like intakes, you may add dietary fibre to reach 3–10 g per day.

faq.q: Is Bio Complete 3 suitable alongside antibiotics?
faq.a: Check with your clinician; spacing probiotics a few hours from antibiotics is common advice.

faq.q: Does CoreBiome® cause cravings or weight changes?
faq.a: Evidence for appetite or weight control is early-stage — manage expectations and monitor response.

references.title: PHGG improves stool form via microbiota
PHGG benefits to skin moisture
references.journal: J Funct Foods in Health and Disease / Elsevier

references.title: PK of sodium butyrate vs tributyrin vs lysine butyrate

description: Convenient triple-biotic with CoreBiome® tributyrin; fibre dose stays on the lighter side.
